title: Encyclopedia Galactica. Astronomy and the stars
brief_description: The birth of the universe, black holes, quasars, photographing the sky, the best telescopes for the lay astronomer, how a planetarium works, major space centres, observatories and astronomical sites, the history of astronomy from the megalithic observatory of Stonehenge to today - in stunning photography and computer graphics.
